Q = 1
kernel = gpflow.kernels.SquaredExponential()
inducing_variable = np.linspace(0, 1, Data.M)[:, (None)]
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    gpflow.models.BayesianGPLVM(Data.Y, np.zeros((Data.N, Q)), np.ones((
        Data.N, Q)), kernel, inducing_variable=inducing_variable,
        num_inducing_variables=len(inducing_variable))
